projects.title: Holy shit NW.js is so easy
projects.author: The Jared Wilcurt

projects.title: NW.js, Vue, Vuetify (6.5 hour video series)
projects.author: Ackzell

projects.title: Making a desktop app: For complete beginners
projects.author: The Jared Wilcurt

projects.title: Reducing app distribution size in NW.js
projects.author: The Jared Wilcurt

projects.title: Building a Desktop App with Vue: NW.js
projects.author: Natalia Tepluhina

projects.title: JavaScript Native Applications for Photoshop (9hr video series)
projects.author: Davide Barranca

projects.title: NW.js Vue-CLI Boilerplate
projects.description: A fully featured boilerplate, complete with Vue-CLI integration and automated builds for web and desktop. Branch for starting with a splash screen as well.

projects.title: NW.js Angular-CLI Boilerplate
projects.description: Angular CLI boilerplate, complete with automated builds for web and desktop.

projects.title: NW.js jQuery Boilerplate
projects.description: Simple example of using jQuery in an NW.js app.

projects.title: NW.js Parcel/HMR boilerplate
projects.description: Hot Module Reloading Parcel (bundler) boilerplate for NW.js

projects.title: NW.js TS Game Boilerplate
projects.description: TypeScript Boilerplate for Game Developers

projects.title: frameless-example
projects.description: Example of creating an NW.js app without a native Window frame from the OS. Includes styled & unstyled example and min/max/restore/close window controls.

projects.title: nw-local-server-example
projects.description: Example of an NW.js app running from a built-in local web server.

projects.title: nw-tray-example
projects.description: Example of running an NW.js app from the tray as a tray icon with a right-click menu.

projects.title: nw-splash-screen-example
projects.description: Example of using the nw-splasher library to show a splash screen while the app is loading.

projects.title: window-communication-example
projects.description: Example of communication between windows in NW.js.

projects.title: create-desktop-shortcuts
projects.description: Easy API to create a desktop shortcut icon to open an app, file, or URL. Customize the icon and location. Cross-platform.

projects.title: node-notifier
projects.description: Native OS desktop notifications for Windows 8/10, Linux, and OSX.

projects.title: NW.js for ARM
projects.description: Community supported prebuilt ARM binaries for NW.js. Also documents how to do custom builds for ARM and Linux.

projects.title: FFmpeg for NW.js
projects.description: Community supported prebuilt FFmpeg binaries for NW.js. This allows you to play proprietary codecs in NW.js windows using HTML5.

projects.title: find-in-nw
projects.description: Creates a fully customizable "Find" box to search for, and highlight text on the page. Opens via Ctrl+F.

projects.title: nw-splasher
projects.description: A library to create a splash screen for your app. Then hide the splash screen and show your app once loading completes. Each window runs in it's own thread so animations play smoothly on the splash screen.

projects.title: nw-programmatic-folder-select
projects.description: Let's you programmatically open a folder selection dialog and runs a callback function with the user's choice.

projects.title: nw-electron-adapter
projects.description: A library that matches Electron's API to support the same features to make transitioning to NW.js simpler.

projects.title: Modules-ABI
projects.description: Node.js and NW.js ABI version mapping dependency

projects.title: node-webkit-window-manager
projects.description: A library to help open new windows, send data to different windows, and close them all at once.

projects.title: Vue DevTools for NW.js
projects.description: Downloads the latest release of Vue-DevTools from the Chome WebStore. Unzips and modifies it to be compatible with the Chromium Dev Tools built in to NW.js.

projects.title: Vue DevTools (Beta) for NW.js
projects.description: Downloads the latest release of the beta version of Vue-DevTools from the Chome WebStore. Unzips and modifies it to be compatible with the Chromium Dev Tools built in to NW.js.

projects.title: nw-img-vue
projects.description: A Vue component that stores images in a local temp location and loads them from there first. If used outside of NW.js, it just displays the images normally.

projects.title: nwutils.github.io
projects.description: <----- Click here to help build this site.

projects.title: nw-window-manager
projects.description: A library to let you easily control all opened windows (hide/show/close/blur/focus remotely).

projects.title: node-default-application-protocol
projects.description: Would allow you to create mycoolappname://settings link (or similar) that would trigger your app to open

projects.title: limited-node-access-example
projects.description: An example for how to give an iframe access to only specific parts of Node

projects.title: faux-tray-menu
projects.description: Workaround for a tray app menu bug. Could also be used as a more robust menu system for tray apps

projects.title: faux-notifications
projects.description: Creating a transparent, custom styled, positioned and sized to look like a desktop notification

projects.title: nw-screen-capture
projects.description: A premade UI with some basic options (like light/dark mode, and maybe a customizable color) for selecting a window/screen to share via nw.Screen.DesktopCaptureMonitor
